bibl.title: A Memorandum with μουζίκιον and Σαΐτιον.
bibl.note: Publishes one of two papyri acquired by the Rare Books Room of the University of Colorado Libraries. Memorandum consisting of a list of sundry items preceded by περὶ τοῦ / τῶν, some notation of expenditure (2nd hand) and a final injunction (3rd hand). Provenance unknown, 5th cent. A.D. - Pp. 215-218: Addendum on the Σαΐτιον. The jar Σαΐτιον is attested in 5 other papyri and in 8 various Byzantine texts.
bibl.seg: MARTINEZ David G., A Memorandum with μουζίκιον and Σαΐτιον.
ZPE 93 (1992) pp. 213-218, 1 tabl. et pl. X.

Publishes one of two papyri acquired by the Rare Books Room of the University of Colorado Libraries. Memorandum consisting of a list of sundry items preceded by περὶ τοῦ / τῶν, some notation of expenditure (2nd hand) and a final injunction (3rd hand). Provenance unknown, 5th cent. A.D. - Pp. 215-218: Addendum on the Σαΐτιον. The jar Σαΐτιον is attested in 5 other papyri and in 8 various Byzantine texts.
